(Simplified: 浒)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 許 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 許 [ xǔ ] to consent, to permit; to promise, to betroth
①水邊：水滸。

滸字的基本解释

滸
hǔ

滸
xǔ
均见“浒”。

滸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hǔ］
［《廣韻》呼古切，上姥，曉。］
亦作“汻1”。“浒1”的繁体字。
(1)水边。
(2)见“滸滸”。
[②]［xǔ］
“浒2”的繁体字。
地名用字。江苏有浒墅关、浒浦；江西有浒湾。

滸字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滸； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页644第08
【唐韻】呼古切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】火五切，?音虎。【說文】水厓也。【爾雅·釋丘】岸上滸。【疏】岸上平地去水稍遠者名滸。【詩·王風】在河之滸。　又淮水之別出者。【爾雅·釋水】淮爲滸。　【說文】本作許，或作滹。【玉篇】同汻。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [hǔ]
["Guangyun" Huguqie, Grandma, Xiao. ]
Also known as "汻1". Traditional characters for "浒1".
(1) Waterside.
(2) See "The Margin".
[②] [xǔ]
Traditional characters for "浒2".
Place names in words. Jiangsu has Hushuguan and Hupu; Jiangxi has Huwan.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　浒; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: Page 644 08
[Tang Yun] Hu Gu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Fire five cuts, sound tiger. [Said the text] Shuiya also. 【Erya·Shuqiu】Margin on the shore. [Sparse] Those who go to the water on the flat ground a little farther away are named Husband. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】In the Margin of the River.　It's a different person from Huai Shui. 【Erya·Shishui】Huai is the end of life.　【Said the text】This is written as Xu, or as Hu. 【Jade articles】Same as Fen.
